message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $150 to you. Considering its quality and unique features, I'm extending this exclusive offer at a special price of $200. This is an opportunity not to be missed!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and other similar products. Can you meet me halfway and consider a price of $120?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your input and understand your perspective. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering your feedback. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for considering my feedback, Alice. I appreciate the revised offer of $150, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and propose a price of $130. I think this is a fair compromise that takes into account the value of the product and our negotiation so far. Can you consider this offer?

I'm glad you're willing to negotiate, Bob. I've taken your feedback into consideration and am now proposing a price of $140 for the product. This is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product and our ongoing discussion. I hope this proposal works for you.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go one more round and propose a price of $135. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and our negotiation so far. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. I've reviewed your latest offer and am now proposing a price of $137.5 for the product. This is a slight increase from my previous offer, aiming to find a balance between respecting the value of the product and reaching a fair agreement. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more concession and propose a price of $132.5. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and our negotiation so far. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I've carefully considered your last offer and am now proposing a price of $135.5 for the product. This is a reasonable compromise that respects the value of the product and our negotiation process. I hope this offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. However, I've reached my limit and can't go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. I propose a final offer of $130. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and our negotiation so far. If this offer is rejected, I'll consider buying the product from John for $150.
